response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I estimate its true worth to be around $1,500,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, while still ensuring a substantial profit for us. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
